data.name: Castillo de San Felipe built
data.desc: Governor [President?] of Guat Diego de Avendaño orders Fuerte Bustamente [now Castillo de San Felipe de Lara] built in port of San Antonio de las Bodegas [S bank of Lake Izabal]
data.note: 1604 Lake Izabal. 12-gun watchtower Sande Torréon destroyed in hostile assault / 1651-1652, 1687-1689,1736, 1797 Lake Izabal. Fort rebuilt, redesigned, or expanded /[missg]
